title: Bug 114903 - Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When previewing the report and clicking on the 'Show Report Parameters' button, all values in the Enter Parameters dialog are empty.
EB: Expected result: Default values should be shown in the value box, allowing the user to modify the specific parameter they want to change.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Preview the report. 2. Click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button. 3. Observe that all values in the Enter Parameters dialog are empty.
